Control Name: 1.6.4 There is awareness around how the application has been built and is being maintained (in house or via an external partner).
Control Statement: Exploring where technical delivery capabilities reside helps to qualify operational model boundaries and estimate the cost of operating the application as well as defining a budget and cost model.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 1.6 What considerations for DevOps practices are you making in this workload?
